28084.summary: Some customers in the South Hill area of Red Deer are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
28084.title: Oct 27 - Red Deer (South Hill) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
